summary: Get the values across a dimension
description:
Gives all values and labels for a dimension in the data cube as a labeled array, similar to how ``apply_dimension()`` passes the values to the child process.

If a dimension with the specified name does not exist, the process fails with a `DimensionNotAvailable` exception.

parameters.name: dimension
parameters.description: The name of the dimension to get the values and labels for.

returns.description: A labeled array with values and labels for the given dimension.

DimensionNotAvailable.message: A dimension with the specified name does not exist.
